descriptionHtml:
Friendship is forever with these little guys, Friendship also costs alot. Especially if you dont know how to talk down Alaric Soultamer at Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead

This mod adds rings that allow you to have a permanent familiar when equipped which should not effect how many summons you can have at once, Unless ofcoarse you have 2 familiar rings equipped which I dont recommend doing. Does not take up any slots.

Familiars are:
Mudcrab
Spider
Wolf
Goat
Fox
Cat
Rabbit
Toy Soldier
Lich
Dragon "only equip during combat then unequip"

More to come...
Familiars now boost exp by a bit.
author: thelawfull
